abstract: Nokia introduced on Tuesday the N9, a sleek, touch-screen smartphone that is designed for one-hand use.
snippet: Nokia introduced on Tuesday the N9, a sleek, touch-screen smartphone that is designed for one-hand use.
lead_paragraph: ESPOO, Finland — Late last year, the Apple iPhone became the best-selling device at Finland’s leading mobile operator, a highly embarrassing situation for Nokia, the struggling mobile phone maker that has long been Finland’s corporate standard-bearer.

headline.main: Nokia Unveils a New Smartphone, but Not a Product of Its Microsoft Deal
headline.print_headline: Nokia to Unveil a New Smartphone, but Not a Product of Its Microsoft Deal
